Title: Relates to chemical testing for prospective foster parents
Summary: Relates to chemical testing for prospective foster parents; includes, but is not limited to drug and alcohol testing; authorizes office of children and family services to issue random chemical testing, including but not limited to, drug testing, to foster parents.
LawCode: Amd ยง378, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to chemical testing for prospective foster care parents
